"We're all responsible and we can collectively fix the next pandemic and prevent it from happening." -Stan Bergman #GlobalHealth #OpenForum
"I don't think any one party is responsible." -Stan Bergman #GlobalHealth #OpenForum #WEF15
"We need a strategic reserve of trained health care professionals and to keep that list current to address pandemic outbreaks" #GlobalHealth
"We have local fire brigades ready to go but we don't have a global emergency preparedness response" -Stan Bergman #GlobalHealth #OpenForum
"The World Health Organization needs funding and a mandate specific to pandemic risk" #GlobalHealth #OpenForum #WEF15 http://t.co/r7pq7YSONr

"We have failed healthcare systems in these three economies of Guinea, Liberia and Sierra Leone." #GlobalHealth #OpenForum
